EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}, Alliance Technology Group, leader in Data Center and Cyber Security Infrastructure solutions and VMTurbo, leader in application performance control will be hosting a dinner at Ruth’s Chris Steakhouse in West Ocean City on Thursday October 15th. We are extending this exclusive invitation to IT professionals and thought leaders in the area to join us and learn about this new and innovative technology.
Some of Maryland’s largest virtualized environments have been working with VMTurbo to help improve application performance, VM to host density, and operational efficiency in their virtual environments.
Customers are using VMTurbo to complement monitoring and alerting tools because the platform:
Takes preventative action to eliminate potential errors and continuously maintain the virtual environment in a state of health. Assures that applications are performing while maximizing the usage of current infrastructure. Quickly provides an increase of VM to host density by 30 -40%. Provides 80% of VMTurbo customers a return on investment in under 90 days.
Details are below:
Thursday, October 15th, 2015 Cocktails and Dinner, 5:30pm – 7:30pm Ruth’s Chris 11501 Maid At Arms Ln Berlin, MD 21811
Please secure your place at the dinner by clicking here http://vmturbo.com/resources/events/alliance-technology-group-vmturbo-dinner/
We hope to see you there!
